summary: This is a simple mod that allows you to change the way Vilja looks. Just download the version you want and follow an easy installer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/9563/wlghd3.png[/img]
[size=4][b][i][color=#e69138][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url][/color][/i][/b][/size]

[size=4][b][i][color=#93c47d]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/color][/i][/b][/size]

[size=4][color=#c27ba0] [color=#ffffff]It is [b][u]VERY[/u][/b] important that you have helped Vilja retrieve the bottle [b][u]BEFORE[/u][/b] you use this. Don't worry, it's her first quest and it takes less than 5 minutes to complete.[/color][/color][/size]

[size=4][color=#6aa84f]Download the mod with NMM to use the XML installer for an easy install :)[/color][/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Requirements[/size][/color]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja in Skyrim[/url][/size]

[color=#ffffff][size=3][b][i]If you want to change her hair I recommend one of these great mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43673/?]Apachii Wigs[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?]The Hairstyler[/url]. Or you can check out the tutorial on how I changed the hair for Sofia over on the Sofia Customizer page if you feel up for some tweaking with .nif files.[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. [i][color=#6aa84f]Base[/color][/i], [color=#6aa84f][i]FOMod[/i][/color] and [i][color=#6aa84f]Options[/color][/i]. Delete the [color=#6aa84f][i]FOMod[/i][/color] folder since you won't need it. Now go to the [i][color=#6aa84f]base[/color][/i] folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\character assets\EMVilja[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. You must also move the contents of [color=#6aa84f][i]head[/i] [/color]t[color=#f4f4f4]o [/color][color=#6aa84f][i]meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\EMCompViljaSkyrim.esp[/i][/color] and the contents of [i][color=#6aa84f]facetint[/color][/i] to [color=#6aa84f][i]textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\emcompviljaskyrim.esp[/i][/color]. Now the body is installed. Now drag the .esp file from [i][color=#6aa84f]bodypatch[/color][/i] to the [i][color=#6aa84f]Data[/color][/i] folder. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\female\EMVilja[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into the [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\eyes[/color][/i] folder.[/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?]Human Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72617/?]SKY Female[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Eyes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Etc[/color][/size]

[/size]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19333159/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/3659/qItycv.png[/img][/url]
[/font][/center]
author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Vilja Customizer Redux - CBBE - 2.5.0
files.changelogHtml:
Added SKY Female Textures as an option
Added Leyenda Skin as a texture option
Updated textures to the latest available version
Removed skeleton
Small tweaks

files.name: Vilja Customizer Redux - CBBE - 2.6F
files.changelogHtml:
Updated all textures to the latest version
Fixed several issues with the FOMod installer
Fixed an issue with the Mature set where the specular maps for the UNP were corrupt.
Removed SevenBase support. If using 7base just replace the meshes
NOTE: This is the final update for this Customizer
